thread.title: David_ Fahey_13119354

author: David_ Fahey_13119354
title: David_ Fahey_13119354
text: I rang sportsden to enquire about a product they had that I seen online. They where extremely helpful in giving me all the info I need and asked for. I ended up purchasing the product from them over the phone which again was effortless. They posted it out that day for me and I was delighted to receive it to my door the following day. Couldn't ask for any more.
